name: Lost Dimension
description: In the near future a terrorist mastermind, known only as ‘The End’, threatens humanity with nuclear armageddon. A special task force, the S.E.A.L.E.D team, are the only ones who can stop him: a group of young combatants with incredible abilities and each with a mysterious past.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.4GHz or comparable Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 or comparable DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1100 MB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or comparable DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1100 MB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
